content: our skilled danish designers created this simple and pretty timeless shawl 1 we know this will be your new everlasting favourite the shawl is worked in cotton kings sultan deluxe this yarn is a soft and fantastic cake yarn available in a wide range of beautiful colour combinations with long gradient colourways pick your favourite colour and leave it up to sultan deluxe to create your timeless shawl have fun **materials ** - cotton kings sultan deluxe - crochet hook 4 mm us size g/6 **measurements ** approx 170 x 66 cm **gauge ** 20 s x 13 row = 10x10 cm 4x4 inch **usage ** 1 ball sultan deluxe **abbreviations ** **chain** chain stitch **st** stitch / stitches **single_crochet** single_crochet **double_crochet** double_crochet **treble_crochet** treble_crochet **fpdc** front post double_crochet **bpdc** back post double_crochet **chain-space** chain-space 1 https //hobbii com/timeless-shawl-sultan-deluxe utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=timeless-shawl-sultan-deluxe+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
